channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

Towards, on and past the bend by highland road & parkland road

item.title: Multiple potholes and uneven road surface on Kingsley Gardens, 15th January
item.description:
Between 1a and number 8. The condition of the road is awful
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Kingsley Gardens, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole, 15th January
item.description:
Someone on this section of road (not far passed the old roundabout) is a pothole that is right in the tyre tracks of all cars. It's heading towards Cirencester in the contra slow system. I can't get the exact location as I'm always driving.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed sign & bollards left on pavement, 15th January
item.description:
On junction of Portland Street, Evesham Road and Clarence Street. Sign and bollards left against metal railings on pavements
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Evesham Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Multiple pot holes in this area and road breaking up on one side, 15th January
item.description:
Road as you turn into Gotherington fields white wall round Four Winds GL52 9SB road collapsing into lay-by opposite this property. Then next to Four Winds property as you turn up a private drive way to Grasson and The Patch the road had a big pot hole in it could be as deeper than golf ball and definitely rounded than a dinner plate. Other pot holes as you go up the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gotherington Fields, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road degradation, 15th January
item.description:
Road degrading around pedestrian/cycle islands up entire stretch of road (cars cannot avoid)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 15th January
item.description:
Customer reporting heavy flooding issues on Cold Pool Lane that have now become a regular issue whenever it rains, making it impassable for vehicles. Asking if grips can be re-cut or cleared, as surface water also freezes in cold weather, causing incidents.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a large amount of standing water on Green St . It seems to be due to the drain being either blocked or completely full but it overflows on even the smallest amount of rainfall, 15th January
